name: hw
description: * Download NodeJS from the [website](https://nodejs.org/en/) and install it. * Make a copy of this folder into your personal one. * Open your Terminal and cd to this folder. * Type ```npm init```. * Keep pressing Enter until it finishes asking for info. * Type ```node app.js```. * Open your browser and go to ```http://localhost:1337```. * You should see a "Hello World" message.
author: hsuan
